words.def: the process of shedding tears (usually accompanied by sobs or other inarticulate sounds)
a convex fold or elevation in the surface of the brain
a facial expression characterized by turning up the corners of the mouth
the dark negative feminine principle in Chinese dualistic cosmology
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
gear (including necessary machinery) for a particular enterprise
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
